mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM DEL_CONTENT_INFO I JOIN DEL_LOCATION_VIEW L ON I.DELIVERY_NUMBER = L.DELIVERY_NUMBER JOIN DELIVERY_MAN D ON I.DELIVERY_NUMBER = D.DELIVERY_NUMBER
and I.DEL_CONTENT_STATE = '보내기'
and I.DEL_CONTENT_STATE = '가져오기'
INNER JOIN SENDUSER SE ON D.SUSER_NO = SE.SUSER_NO AND SE.SUSER_ID = #{suserId}
WHERE D.DELIVERY_STATE = 7
WHERE D.DELIVERY_STATE != 7
ORDER BY I.DELIVERY_NUMBER DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT COUNT(I.DELIVERY_NUMBER) FROM DEL_CONTENT_INFO I JOIN DEL_LOCATION_VIEW L ON I.DELIVERY_NUMBER = L.DELIVERY_NUMBER JOIN DELIVERY_MAN D ON I.DELIVERY_NUMBER = D.DELIVERY_NUMBER
WHERE I.DELIVERY_NUMBER > 0 AND D.SUSER_NO = (SELECT SU.SUSER_NO FROM SENDUSER SU WHERE SU.SUSER_ID = #{suserId})

SELECT * FROM DEL_CONTENT_INFO I JOIN CATAGORY_MAN C ON I.CATAGORY_ID = C.CATAGORY_ID JOIN DEL_LOCATION_VIEW L ON I.DELIVERY_NUMBER = L.DELIVERY_NUMBER JOIN DELIVERY_MAN D ON I.DELIVERY_NUMBER = D.DELIVERY_NUMBER JOIN DELIVERY_METHOD M ON I.DELIVERY_NUMBER = M.DELIVERY_NUMBER WHERE I.DELIVERY_NUMBER=#{DELIVERY_NUMBER};

mapper.select: SELECT R.RUSER_PHOTO AS ruserPhoto, R.RUSER_ID AS ruserId, R.RUSER_NAME AS ruserName, R.RUSER_POINT AS ruserPoint, ( SELECT COUNT(DC.RUSER_ID) FROM DELIVERY_MAN DM INNER JOIN DEL_CANDIDATE DC ON DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER = DC.DELIVERY_NUMBER WHERE DM.DELIVERY_STATE = 7 AND DC.CANDIDATE_STATE = 1 AND DC.RUSER_ID= R.RUSER_ID ) AS ruserDeliveryCnt, ( SELECT COUNT(RM.TOTAL_STAR) FROM REVIEW_MAN RM WHERE RM.RUSER_ID = R.RUSER_ID ) AS reviewCount, ( SELECT SUM(RM.TOTAL_STAR) FROM REVIEW_MAN RM WHERE RM.RUSER_ID = R.RUSER_ID )AS reviewTotalStar, IFNULL(RG.RGRADE_CODE,'3') AS ruserGrade, DC.PICKUP_TIME AS pickupTime, DC.MESSAGE AS message, DC.DELIVERY_NUMBER as deliveryNumber FROM ROADUSER R INNER JOIN DEL_CANDIDATE DC ON R.RUSER_ID = DC.RUSER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RUSER_GRADE RG ON R.RUSER_ID = RG.RUSER_ID WHERE DC.DELIVERY_NUMBER = #{deliveryNumber}

SELECT /* 배송 히스토리 타임라인에서 회원정보를 가져오는 부분 | com.misonamoo.smileway.mappers.DeliveryServiceImpl.delHistory | 한상희 */ S.SUSER_ID, S.SPHONE, S.SUSER_NAME, S.SUSER_PHOTO, UG.GRADE_CODE FROM SENDUSER S INNER JOIN DELIVERY_MAN DM ON S.SUSER_NO = DM.SUSER_NO INNER JOIN USER_GRADE UG ON S.SUSER_NO = UG.SUSER_NO WHERE DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER = #{DELIVERY_NUMBER};

SELECT /* 배송 히스토리 타임라인 배송 상태별로 조회하기 | com.misonamoo.smileway.mappers.DeliveryServiceImpl.delHistory | 한상희 */ DH.DEL_CHANGE_TIME AS DEL_CHANGE_TIME, DH.DELIVERY_STATE AS DELIVERY_STATE, IFNULL(DH.DEL_PIC1,"없음") AS DEL_PIC1, IFNULL(DH.DEL_PIC2,"없음") AS DEL_PIC2, IFNULL(DH.DEL_PIC3,"없음") AS DEL_PIC3, DH.DEL_MESSAGE AS DEL_MESSAGE FROM DEL_STATE_HISTORY DH INNER JOIN DELIVERY_MAN DM ON DH.DELIVERY_NUMBER = DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER WHERE DH.DELIVERY_NUMBER = #{DELIVERY_NUMBER} ORDER BY DH.DELIVERY_STATE ASC
